remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsVolatile` 用于仅在自定义修饰符的方法签名中指示它将标记的字段是易失性。`IsVolatile` is used only in custom modifiers of method signatures to indicate that the field it marks is volatile. 将元数据导入包含一个或多个字段标记为易失性任何编译器必须使用带有前缀的说明`volatile.`来访问这些字段。Any compiler that imports metadata with one or more fields marked as volatile must use instructions prefixed with `volatile.` to access such fields. 中的类仅用于编译器编写器。The classes in are for compiler writers' use only. 编译器发出元数据更改，在实时 (JIT) 编译器处理值时的默认行为是不适当的方式中的自定义修饰符。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到了一个自定义修饰符时，它处理修饰符指定的方法中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以将自定义修饰符应用于方法、 参数和返回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需的修饰符，但可以忽略可选的修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. C + + 编译器可以发出自定义修饰符，用于描述一个字节应如何处理在其中 JIT 编译器与 c + + 不兼容的方式将字节的情况下默认情况下。A C++ compiler could emit a custom modifier to describe how a byte should be treated in cases where the JIT compiler treats bytes in a manner that is not compatible with C++ by default. 可以将自定义修饰符发出到元数据中使用以下方法之一：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法如类， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成包含对的调用的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令文件`modopt`和`modreq`，并组合成与文件[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用非托管的反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API.
